price: 95 Nous sommes, en vérité, parfaitement capable de te montrer ce dont Nous les menaçons.
arabic: وَإِنَّا عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّرِيَكَ مَا نَعِدُهُمۡ لَقَٰدِرُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: wa-innā ʿalā an nuriyaka mā naʿiduhum laqādirūna
